category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEGANTTDefaultFlowColor
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default color a flow has in the representation area of the Gantt chart viewer. For example, 0;0;0 represents the color black and 0;255;255 represents the color aqua. Valid Values: String of the format int;int;int with int:=0|1|2|..|255.
